description: This file implements various message output handlers within the WPEFramework, including conversions, console, syslog, file, JSON formatting, and UDP transmission for messages. It defines classes and methods for transforming message metadata, outputting messages to different targets, and managing UDP data channels.

classes.name: Text
classes.description: Provides string conversion functionality for message metadata based on the message info.

classes.name: SyslogOutput
classes.description: Outputs messages to the syslog facility or stdout on Windows.

classes.name: FileOutput
classes.description: Outputs messages to a file if it is open.

classes.name: JSON
classes.description: Converts message metadata and text into a JSON data structure based on specified output options.

classes.name: UDPOutput
classes.description: Handles UDP channel creation, sending data, and message transmission over UDP.

classes.name: UDPOutput::Channel
classes.description: Represents a UDP datagram channel used for sending data packets.

methods.name: Text::Convert
methods.description: Converts message info and text into a string representation, including message type and optionally abbreviations.

methods.name: ConsoleOutput::Message
methods.description: Outputs the converted message to standard output.

methods.name: SyslogOutput::Message
methods.description: Sends the message to syslog or stdout depending on platform.

methods.name: FileOutput::Message
methods.description: Writes the converted message to an open file.

methods.name: JSON::Convert
methods.description: Populates a JSON data object with metadata fields and message text based on specified options.

methods.name: UDPOutput::Channel::Channel
methods.description: Constructor initializing UDP datagram channel with a target node ID.

methods.name: UDPOutput::Channel::SendData
methods.description: Sends a data frame over UDP, returning the number of bytes sent.

methods.name: UDPOutput::Channel::Output
methods.description: Serializes metadata and message into the send buffer and triggers transmission.

methods.name: UDPOutput::UDPOutput
methods.description: Constructor that initializes UDP output with a target node ID.

methods.name: UDPOutput::Message
methods.description: Creates a TextMessage from string and sends it via UDP.

methods.name: string Convert(const Core::Messaging::MessageInfo & metadata,const string & text)
void Convert(const Core::Messaging::MessageInfo & metadata,const string & text,Data & data)
void Message(const Core::Messaging::MessageInfo & metadata,const string & text)
void Output(const Core::Messaging::Metadata & metadata,const Core::Messaging::IEvent * message)

ctags.pattern: /^    string Text::Convert(const Core::Messaging::MessageInfo& metadata, const string& text) \/* o/

ctags.name: Message
